dcterms:creator: Shuran Song
Samuel P Lichtenberg
Jianxiong Xiao
dcterms:description: The SUN RGB-D dataset provides room corner coordinates on the x-z plane, as well as the upper and lower y height of the room, all defined in the world coordinates. This information allows for the construction of a 2.5D extruded floor plan for the room for each pair of RGB and Depth images.
dcterms:title: SUN RGB-D

dcterms:creator: Jian Zhang
Chen Kan
Alexander G Schwing
Raquel Urtasun
dcterms:description: The NYUDv2 303 dataset is used for capturing useful room layout information and producing predictions at the 2D room segmentation for indoor images.
dcterms:title: NYUDv2 303

dcterms:creator: Angela Dai
Angel X Chang

dcterms:description: ScanNet is utilized to produce 3D room layouts, demonstrating the informative nature of the measurements produced by the network, even without prior training on the dataset.
dcterms:title: ScanNet
